issue.title: Gauge type series can not use "merge" input
issue.body:
Hi,

I am building a gauge chart that looks like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45992275/194005587-91e611a8-351d-444d-a14e-257ca5da1212.png)

Before implementing the chart in your lib I was creating the options inside echarts example playgraund.
These are the options: 
[gouge-thresholds.txt](https://github.com/xieziyu/ngx-echarts/files/9713680/gouge-thresholds.txt)

The issue that I have with your lib is that I can not use the "merge" input of your directive as I did into the playground with the "setInterval" function.

When I provide into the "merge" the data series like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45992275/194006956-245dcb6d-7e34-4393-8993-ceab27989794.png)
This errros will appear:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45992275/194007147-84e6a6e6-2e8c-470f-90cc-79c3b8ffeb50.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45992275/194007269-e3204ab7-f26e-4a8d-a0e1-15fe6d01e3bc.png)

Having this errors the graph will never refresh again.

If the "merge" is undefined than no errors will be thrown but I will get a flickering on the axis labels at init.

Maybe I am doing something wrong and I would like to hear your opinion on this.

Thanks for your work,
Razvan I.

comment.body:
Hi, @sneaker102 
I create a demo using your chart options:
https://jake.stackblitz.com/edit/ngx-echarts-issue-373?file=src/app/app.component.ts
but it works as expected.
Maybe you can provide more details about your codes that I need to reproduce the issue.

issue.title: Gauge type series can not use "merge" input
issue.body:
Hi,

I am building a gauge chart that looks like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45992275/194005587-91e611a8-351d-444d-a14e-257ca5da1212.png)

Before implementing the chart in your lib I was creating the options inside echarts example playgraund.
These are the options: 
[gouge-thresholds.txt](https://github.com/xieziyu/ngx-echarts/files/9713680/gouge-thresholds.txt)

The issue that I have with your lib is that I can not use the "merge" input of your directive as I did into the playground with the "setInterval" function.

When I provide into the "merge" the data series like this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45992275/194006956-245dcb6d-7e34-4393-8993-ceab27989794.png)
This errros will appear:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45992275/194007147-84e6a6e6-2e8c-470f-90cc-79c3b8ffeb50.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45992275/194007269-e3204ab7-f26e-4a8d-a0e1-15fe6d01e3bc.png)

Having this errors the graph will never refresh again.

If the "merge" is undefined than no errors will be thrown but I will get a flickering on the axis labels at init.

Maybe I am doing something wrong and I would like to hear your opinion on this.

Thanks for your work,
Razvan I.

comment.body: `merge` is used to update options after the chart is initialized. So you can try to provide `merge` object after delaying for some time, for example, assign `merge` within `setTimeout` or `setInterval` callbacks

issue.title: event is not work

comment.body:
There is a bug in the demo page. The event emitters are case sensitive. Please refer to the source file:
https://github.com/xieziyu/ngx-echarts/blob/master/src/app/pages/demo-basic/basic/basic-events/basic-events.component.html

issue.title: No coordinate system that supports convertToPixel found by the given finder >>> I can not drag the nodes of a graph
No coordinate system that supports convertToPixel found by the given finder >>> I can not drag the nodes of a graph

commits.message: docs: add ngx-echarts to Angular Component

Merge pull request #47 from xieziyu/docs/angular

docs: add ngx-echarts to Angular Component

pull_request.title: docs: add ngx-echarts to Angular Component
pull_request.body:
文档中维护的 AngularJS 相关的框架资源都比较古早了，皆无法适用于 Angular 2 以上版本。
这里推荐的 [ngx-echarts](https://github.com/xieziyu/ngx-echarts) 是目前仍在活跃维护的 Angular Directive 封装，最新已支持到 Angular 14 以上的项目。
